metadata.title: USN-2171-1 -- rsync vulnerability
metadata.description: Ryan Finnie discovered that the rsync daemon incorrectly handled invalid usernames. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause rsync to consume resources, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2171-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  rsync - 3.1.0-2ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
